title: MS. MARVEL volume 1  001-023 (1977-1979) plus "lost" 0
description:
For gpack3, although I think a couple of people have requested this before.

(Ms. Marvel is now the Avengers member Captain Marvel.)

Not my set; Not my torrent! I found it on another site, looks like it came from h33t. All credit to whoever put it together, and the scanner(s)!

The "lost" issues 24 & 25 are fan edits of stories published some 12 years after they were shelved due to low sales. (See below for more info.)  --STF

------

From Comic Vine:

Ms. Marvel Volume 1

Ms. Marvel's first ongoing series. It follows the adventures of Carol Danvers after she gained superpowers and became a superhero. With issue 20, she changed costumes into the one that is most famous today. The series was cancelled with issue 23 in the middle of a storyline. However, years later however, Marvel Super-Heroes issue 10 and 11 printed the (already finished) stories intended for issues 24 and 25 and their covers. This included the original (planned) 1st appearance of the X-Man Rogue.
